statements: SELECT * FROM event_logs;
SELECT event_id, event_timestamp FROM event_logs ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC;
SELECT event_timestamp, event_description, event_id FROM event_logs WHERE event_id > 10;
SELECT event_description FROM event_logs WHERE event_id BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT * FROM event_logs WHERE event_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM event_logs ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC, event_id ASC, event_description
SELECT event_id, event_description FROM event_logs WHERE event_id > 100 ORDER BY event_timestamp
SELECT event_id, event_description FROM event_logs WHERE event_description LIKE '%error%'
SELECT COUNT(event_id), DATE_TRUNC('day', event_timestamp) AS event_day FROM event_logs GROUP BY DATE_TRUNC('day', event_timestamp) ORDER BY event_day ASC
SELECT event_id, event_timestamp, LENGTH(event_description) AS description_length FROM event_logs ORDER BY description_length DESC
SELECT * FROM event_logs;
SELECT id, timestamp, log_message FROM event_logs WHERE application_id = '12345';
SELECT id, timestamp, log_message FROM event_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, timestamp, application_id FROM event_logs WHERE log_message LIKE '%error%';
SELECT id, timestamp, application_id, log_message FROM event_logs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM event_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, timestamp, application_id FROM alerts WHERE severity > 3 ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT id, timestamp, application_id FROM event_logs WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND log_message LIKE '%error%'
SELECT * FROM alerts WHERE severity BETWEEN 1 AND 5 ORDER BY severity DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT id, timestamp, application_id, log_message FROM event_logs WHERE application_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc' ORDER BY timestamp
SELECT * FROM event_logs;
SELECT event_name, event_timestamp FROM event_logs WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM alerts ORDER BY alert_timestamp DESC;
SELECT alert_type, alert_message FROM alerts WHERE alert_id > 5;
SELECT app_name, app_description FROM edge_apps WHERE app_id IN (2, 4, 6);
SELECT * FROM event_logs WHERE event_timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT event_name, event_description FROM event_logs WHERE event_name LIKE 'Error%';
SELECT event_name, COUNT(*) AS event_count FROM event_logs GROUP BY event_name;
SELECT * FROM alerts ORDER BY alert_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT app_name, app_description FROM edge_apps WHERE app_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM EventLogs;
SELECT log_id, event_name, event_timestamp FROM EventLogs WHERE event_description LIKE '%error%';
SELECT app_id, app_name FROM EdgeApplications ORDER BY app_name DESC;
SELECT alert_message FROM Alerts WHERE alert_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT log_id, event_name, alert_id FROM EventLogMapping INNER JOIN Alerts ON EventLogMapping.alert_id = Alerts.alert_id;
SELECT * FROM EventLogs WHERE log_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, event_description FROM EventLogs WHERE event_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT e.log_id, e.event_name, a.alert_message FROM EventLogs e JOIN EventLogMapping em ON e.log_id = em.log_id JOIN Alerts a ON em.alert_id = a.alert_id;
SELECT app_id, app_name, app_description FROM EdgeApplications ORDER BY app_name DESC;
SELECT event_name, COUNT(*) AS event_count FROM EventLogs GROUP BY event_name HAVING event_count > 1;
SELECT * FROM event_logs;
SELECT log_id, event_time, event_type FROM event_logs WHERE event_type = 'error';
SELECT device_name, location FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'mobile' ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT app_name, app_version FROM applications WHERE app_name LIKE 'A%' AND app_version = '1.0';
SELECT log_id, device_id, app_id FROM logs WHERE log_description IS NOT NULL AND log_data @> '{"severity": "high"}' LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM event_logs WHERE event_type = 'error';
SELECT * FROM alerts ORDER BY alert_time DESC;
SELECT device_name, location FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'server' AND location LIKE '%USA%';
SELECT app_name, app_version FROM applications WHERE app_version IN ('1.0', '2.0', '3.0') ORDER BY app_name ASC;
SELECT event_time, event_type, event_description FROM event_logs INNER JOIN logs ON event_logs.log_id = logs.log_id WHERE logs.device_id = 1;
